.entry-header Groups & Events Get In Touch TopGolf Swing Suite Fort Myers Contact For questions and more information, please reach out below. For questions and information, please reach out. Contact Details Call Us: (239) 314-3728 Email: Send us an email 2200 Edwards Drive, Fort Myers, FL 33901 Suite 100 View our FAQs | Book a Swing Suite Bay Pricing & More Info Request For Proposal
Make a sport out of socializing with top golf swing suites®! Tee up for an immersive golf experience paired with a lively pub atmosphere. Rent out a hitting bay (or the whole venue!) for your next work or social gathering. It's the perfect spot to host a party, hang with friends and family, or even practice your drive during the off-season. YOUR NEXT SOCIAL GATHERING OR WORK OUTING IS SURE TO BE A HOLE-IN-ONE! NOT A GOLFER? Chips Sports Pub is more than just golf! Take a swing at a variety of virtual games including Zombie Dodgeball, hockey, baseball, football, carnival games and more. Kick back with comfortable lounge seating, HDTVs and top-notch food and beverage service. Request A Proposal Host your next company team-building session, birthday party or special event in our luxurious, private game suites! You'll enjoy food and beverage service as your group of 12-60 guests receive the VIP treatment with a wide variety of simulation games suitable for every age and skill level. Host your next company team-building session, birthday party or special event in our luxurious, private game suites! You'll enjoy food and beverage service as your group of 12-60 guests. 2200 Edwards Drive Fort Myers, FL 33901 Suite 100 Swing Suite Our Games Book a Bay Chips Menu Groups & Events Gift Cards Hours Wednesday - Thursday: 4PM-10PM Friday: 4PM-12AM Saturday: 12PM-12AM Sunday: 12PM-8PM Monday - Tuesday: CLOSED About Us Careers Diversity Press & Media Contact Us Phone: 239-314-3862 Privacy Policy Accessibility .entry-content .clear #post-## .entry-header Groups & Events Get In Touch TopGolf Swing Suite Fort Myers Contact For questions and more information, please reach out below.
